title: La Manufacture d'anouk
description: A cozy 100% vegetarian/vegan cafe located in the city centre Oberstadt. Uses organic ingredients from fair trade brands for the cakes and chocolate. Seating area inside and outside. Vegan cake offered only on Fridays. Some vegan in-house-made chocolate is available for take-out also. Has soy or nut milk for coffee, cocoa and teas (mostly fair trade). Custom made cakes can be ordered in advance. In summer serves mostly vegan ice cream.
